name: washingtonpost
text:
“I’m talking too freely,” Maryanne Trump Barry, a former federal judge, said during 15 hours recorded in 2018 and 2019 by her niece, Mary L. Trump.

The remarks are the most critical comments known to have been made about the president by a sibling. https://t.co/hPiPcQXupw https://t.co/pVoSkzjgLl
